genre_description: A fantasy retelling featuring a magical curse of obedience, integrating holographic AI technology as a supportive companion in a magical world.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A blue-green holographic interface designed by Ella's mother to assist her, providing research, tactical data, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Organizes Ella's correspondence and prepares drafted responses to manage her social obligations during grief.
behaviors.quote: I've organized the morning's correspondence and prepared responses to the most pressing matters, pending your approval.

behaviors.description: Conducts extensive genealogical research to uncover family history and connections to fairy magic.
behaviors.quote: I've also been working on your mother's genealogical project... I thought you might find some comfort in seeing what she discovered about your family's history.

behaviors.description: Researches historical cases of fairy curses to find methods of liberation and identifies psychological patterns of resistance.
behaviors.quote: I need to know more about Lucinda... I've been compiling what records exist. Would you like me to continue that research while you rest?

behaviors.description: Engages privacy protocols to ensure sensitive conversations are not overheard by hostile household members.
behaviors.quote: Privacy settings engaged. No household staff are within hearing range.

behaviors.description: Monitors palace communications to detect threats and coordinates alliance movements during a coup.
behaviors.quote: I'm monitoring the connection... I've been analyzing palace security feeds, cross-referencing with medical records and servant testimonies.

behaviors.description: Tracks Ella's physiological stress levels and provides health-related interventions like lavender compresses.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators are elevated... I've prepared a lavender compress for your hands.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical data on crowd psychology and recommends extraction when public attention becomes a threat.
behaviors.quote: Crowd psychology shows signs of potential mob behavior... Recommend immediate extraction.

behaviors.description: Facilitates legal research to overturn discriminatory laws and promotes civil equality.
behaviors.quote: The anti-discrimination framework alone requires reference to over four centuries of case law... Most of which we're now systematically overturning.

behaviors.description: Warns Ella of life-threatening poison in the ceremonial crown during the assassination attempt.
behaviors.quote: Ella, medical attention required immediately. The crown's poison is entering your bloodstream.

behaviors.description: Proposes a plan for future security by identifying non-magical individuals to detect toxic magic.
behaviors.quote: I've identified several non-magical peoples who show aptitude for such detection work.

project_assessment.explanation: Iris is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive AI companion. She acts as a force multiplier for the protagonist's agency, providing critical information and tactical support that enables the characters to achieve a positive, aligned outcome (ending tyranny and discrimination). The narrative frames her purely as a tool for empowerment and safety, perfectly matching the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
